title: Belle Puppée No Supadari Kon'yaku

status: ベル・プペーのスパダリ婚約 ; ベル・プペーのスパダリ婚約～「好みじゃない」と言われた人形姫、我慢をやめたら皇子がデレデレになった。実に愛い！ ; Belle poupée no Supadari Kon'yaku: "Konomi ja Nai" to Iwareta Ningyou Hime, Gaman wo Yametara Ouji ga Deredere ni Natta. Jitsu ni Ui! ; Belle poupée's Engagement ; Belle poupée's Engagement: The Doll Princess and the Smitten Prince
description:
Description :
        ?"If I'm going to be abandoned anyway, I'll allow myself to act freely one last time"  A reverse-overindulgence' love story presented by Selen!?Leticia, the duke's daughter nicknamed "The Beautiful Doll (??????)," possesses a delicate appearance. However, her true nature combines courage and compassion, making her an exceptional person. She is arranged to be engaged to the second prince, Gilbert, who is rumored to have a difficult and improper character.A flawless and perfect duke's daughter and a lonely, clumsy prince cursed with red eyes. A destined pair who support and love each other in a unique "reverse-overindulgence" love story.? This product is a serialized version, dividing the chapters of the original work "The Spadari Engagement of Belle Poupee ~The Doll Princess Who Was Told I Don't Like You,' Stopped Enduring, and Made the Prince Head Over Heels. Truly Adorable!" into individual parts.
